name: The Answer is Tea
description:
The Answer is Tea is a silly little game that's more of a joke than anything else. Roll 2d6, use your result to see on the table what problem you face today, and come up with ways to deal with them. When all else fails, there's a hint given to help you out.

The entire thing fits on a business card, front and back. I've included a version you can print on a piece of paper for sake of ease.

Please enjoy this with a good cuppa!
